title: Access Your Health Records Anytime, Anywhere
text: Our healthcare portal enables doctors to efficiently create electronic medical records (EMRs), allowing patients to access their health information securely anytime, anywhere. This streamlined access helps patients make informed decisions about their health and consultations.

section.title: Why Antd?
section.content: Ant Design is a React UI library that has a lot of easy-to-use components for building elegant UI.

section.title: Why styled-components?
section.content: Styled Components gives you total control over your components.
